mapper.insert: insert into myscoremanage.order (ceid, senderName, senderPhone, departure, receiveName, receivePhone, destination, cargoType, weight, volume, cost, state, submitTime) values(#{ceid}, #{senderName}, #{senderPhone}, #{departure}, #{receiveName}, #{receivePhone}, #{destination}, #{cargoType}, #{weight}, #{volume}, #{cost}, #{state}, #{submitTime});
mapper.update: update myscoremanage.order set coid = #{coid}, state="已接单" where oid=#{oid};
update myscoremanage.order set sendTime = #{sendTime}, state="已发货" where oid=#{oid};
update myscoremanage.order set receiveTime=#{receiveTime}, state="已到达" where oid=#{oid};
mapper.select: select * from myscoremanage.order where state="待接单";
select * from myscoremanage.order where cargoType=#{cargoType} and coid=#{coid};
mapper.insert: insert into myscoremanage.logistics (oid, recordTime, location) values(#{oid}, #{recordTime}, #{location});
mapper.select: select * from myscoremanage.logistics where oid=#{oid} order by recordTime desc
